name: babylonjs-editor-es6
description: Babylon.js Editor is a Web Application helping artists to work with Babylon.js

scripts.clean: rimraf build && rimraf declaration && rimraf dist && rimraf electron-packages
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run compile-electron && npm run compile-photoshop && npm run build-vscode-extension && npm run bundle
scripts.build-vscode-extension: cd vscode-extension && npm i && npm run package && cd ..
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
